summary: A man's wife leaves him to take up with an artist, so the man responds by becoming the artist's roommate.
cast: Heiner Lauterbach|Uwe Ochsenknecht|Ulrike Kriener|Janna Marangosoff|Dietmar Bär|Marie-Charlott Schüler|Edith Volkmann|Monika Schwarz|Lois Kelz|Cornelia Schneider|Gabriel Pakleppa|Roland Schreiber|Jörg Neumann|Gerd Huber|Werner-Albert Püthe|Nasrin Khochsima|Sabine Wegner|Björn Banhardt|Doris Dörrie|Ulrich Günther
title: Hombres...
